renderer.components.settingsPage.updates: If enabled, updates to the Desktop App will download automatically and you will be notified when they're ready to install.

Show icon in the notification area
renderer.components.settingsPage.startAp: If enabled, the app starts automatically when you log in to your machine.

renderer.components.settingsPage.minimiz: If enabled, the app stays running in the notification area after app window is closed.
Leave the app running in the notification area when the application window is closed
renderer.components.settingsPage.logging: Increasing the log level increases disk space usage and can impact performance. It is recommended to only increase the log level if you are having issues.
Logging is helpful for developers and support to isolate issues you may be encountering with the desktop app.
renderer.components.settingsPage.launchA: If enabled, the app will start in system tray, and will not show the window on launch.
renderer.components.settingsPage.fullscr: If enabled, the Mattermost application will always open in full screen
renderer.components.settingsPage.flashWi: This functionality may not work with all Linux window managers.
If enabled, the taskbar icon will flash for a few seconds when a new message is received.
Flash taskbar icon when a new message is received
renderer.components.settingsPage.enableH: If enabled, the Mattermost UI is rendered more efficiently but can lead to decreased stability for some systems.
renderer.components.settingsPage.downloa: Specify the folder where files will download.
renderer.components.settingsPage.checkSp: Specify the URL where dictionary definitions can be retrieved
Highlight misspelt words in your messages based on your system language or language preference.
renderer.components.settingsPage.bounceI: If enabled, the Dock icon bounces once or until the user opens the app when a new notification is received.
renderer.components.settingsPage.appLang: Chooses the language that the Desktop App will use for menu items and popups. This feature is still in beta, and some languages will be missing translation strings.
renderer.components.settingsPage.afterRe: Setting takes effect after restarting the app.
